intent_atoms.description: Wrap FoundationUI form components (DS.TextInput, DS.Toggle, DS.Picker) and migrate existing input patterns in settings and configuration dialogs to use these standardized controls.
BoxTextInputView wrapper component created with ISO-specific styling, placeholder, validation, keyboard types, and accessibility support.
BoxToggleView wrapper component created with label, disabled state, and accessibility labels.
BoxPickerView wrapper component created with custom selection logic, binding to Codable enums, and accessibility support.
Audit existing form inputs across codebase (settings panel, configuration dialogs, search/filter controls) and document findings.
Migrate at least 3 critical form locations to use new wrappers, prioritizing settings panel inputs.
Unit tests for all three wrapper components covering input validation, state binding, accessibility attributes with ≥90% coverage.
Snapshot tests (light/dark modes) for empty, filled, error, and disabled states of all three components on macOS, iOS, iPadOS.
Accessibility tests ensuring VoiceOver labels, focus management, keyboard interaction with ≥98% audit score.
Update Component Showcase with form control examples.
Add DocC documentation for wrapper components and update Technical Spec with Form Controls subsection.
Update MIGRATION.md with old→new form control mapping.
SwiftLint violations: 0; no force unwraps or implicitly unwrapped optionals; all components marked @MainActor where appropriate.
FoundationUI Swift Package must be available in ISOInspectorApp before integration.
Integration test infrastructure must be in place prior to component implementation.
BoxTextInputView public API includes @Binding var text, placeholder, validationError, keyboardType, onEditingChanged.
BoxToggleView public API includes @Binding var isOn, label, disabled.
BoxPickerView generic over selection type T: Hashable with @Binding var selection, label, options.

functional_units.name: BoxTextInputView
functional_units.description: Wrapper component exposing a styled text input field with placeholder, validation error display, keyboard type support, and binding to external text state.

functional_units.name: BoxToggleView
functional_units.description: Wrapper component providing a styled toggle switch with label, disabled state handling, accessibility labeling, and binding to an external boolean state.

functional_units.name: BoxPickerView
functional_units.description: Generic wrapper for a picker control that binds to a selectable value, presents options with labels, supports Codable enums or hashable types, and adapts platform-specific presentation.

functional_units.name: AccessibilityTestsForFormControls
